attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would appreciate it if the Prime Minister would take action, to reduce the amount of interest that can be charged on a loan to set a threshold.  Such amounts as 239% APR should be made illegal.  It appears companies can charge what they want.  Such as the new pay day loans can be something like 2000% APR. These are an import from America and have caused great distress and hardship.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
